price: Apakah engkau mengira bahwa orang yang mendiami gua, dan (yang mempunyai) raqīm485) itu, termasuk tanda-tanda (kebesaran) Kami yang menakjubkan?
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا
footnotes: *485) Raqim, sebagian mufasir mengartikan nama anjing dan sebagian yang lain mengartikan batu bersurat.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasib'ta anna aṣḥāba al-kahfi wal-raqīmi kānū min āyātinā ʿajaban
